title: *** Heartbreaking Paris Apartment One Bedroom for rent ***
body:
QR Code Link to This Post


BECAUSE I RENT MY PERSONAL APARTMENT PRIVATELY, I HAVE A DEMAND, IN YOUR QUERY/RESPONSE, WRITE YOUR E-MAIL

With your stay here, you'll be centrally located in the city, within a 10-minute walk of a lot of needed places for supplies and living. This is a 5-star apartment!
Feel yourself at home in this beautiful decorated apartment, featuring kitchenettes with refrigerators and microwaves. Your pillowtop bed comes with premium bedding. Rooms have private balconies. Flat-screen televisions with satellite programming provide entertainment, while complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected.
Featured amenities for all your need and laundry services. Limited parking for just one car is available onsite.

AGAIN: I HOPE YOU READ THE DESCRIPTION AND WILL SEND ALSO YOUR E-MAIL, BECAUSE THE IS NO OTHER WAY TO SPEAK.
